00062 template <class ParameterInterace>
00063 void TParamsPtr<ParameterInterace>::Init(const IParamsSet* parameterSetPtr, const QByteArray& parameterId, bool I_IF_DEBUG(isObligatory))
00064 {
00065        if ((parameterSetPtr != NULL) && !parameterId.isEmpty()){
00066               BaseClass::SetPtr(dynamic_cast<const ParameterInterace*>(parameterSetPtr->GetParameter(parameterId)));
00067 
00068               I_IF_DEBUG(
00069                      if (!IsValid() && isObligatory){
00070                             iprm::IParamsSet::Ids existingParamIds = parameterSetPtr->GetParamIds();
00071                             QStringList existingIds;
00072                             for (iprm::IParamsSet::Ids::ConstIterator index = existingParamIds.constBegin(); index != existingParamIds.constEnd(); index++){
00073                                    existingIds.push_back(*index);
00074                             }
00075 
00076                             QString idList = existingIds.join(", ");
00077                             QString debugMessage = QString("Parameter %1 was not found in the parameter set. Following parameter IDs are registered: %2").arg(QString(parameterId)).arg(idList);
00078 
00079                             qDebug(debugMessage.toUtf8());
00080                      }
00081               )
00082        }
00083        else{
00084               BaseClass::Reset();
00085        }
00086 }
